p: The experiment was carried out for four periods with each period consisting of 21 days. The first 14 days were for animal adaptation, while the last 7 days for sample collection. Animals were raised in individual pen and received the experimental diets twice a day at 7.00 am and 3.00 pm with free water and mineral lick blocks. Fresh SG was cut around 45 days of growth and chopped daily before feeding. The difference between roughage quantity allocated and refusals were voluntary feed intake of roughages for every day of the trial. Concentrates were fed according to the respective treatments.
